Texts.Chs: 把^orange;原体锭^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Protocite Bars^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 有一种罕见的金属名叫^orange;原体矿^reset;，它只存在于^orange;原毒星球^reset;上。我现在急需^orange;2个原体锭^reset;。你可以在你的^orange;裂变反应炉^reset;中熔炼它。
Texts.Eng: There is a rare metal native ^red;only^reset; to ^orange;Proto Worlds^reset; that I am in dire need of. ^orange;I need 2 protocite bars^reset;. You can smelt them in a ^orange;Fission Furnace^reset;.
Without protocite you won't be able to make some of the more essential high-end gear. So stay stocked! In return for that bit of help, perhaps try this on!
